statements: SELECT * FROM regulatory_audits WHERE audit_type = 'Internal';
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, compliance_status FROM regulatory_audits WHERE regulatory_body = 'FDA';
SELECT audit_type, COUNT(*) FROM regulatory_audits GROUP BY audit_type;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT regulatory_body FROM regulatory_audits;
SELECT audit_id, audit_type, audit_date, compliance_status, regulatory_body FROM regulatory_audits;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_audits WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT regulatory_body, audit_id FROM regulatory_audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT audit_id, regulatory_body FROM regulatory_audits WHERE audit_type = 'Quality Audit';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_audits WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01' AND audit_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_audits;
SELECT audit_type, audit_result, audit_date FROM regulatory_audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_audits WHERE audit_type = 'Compliance';
SELECT inspection_id, inspection_date, inspected_entity FROM regulatory_inspections ORDER BY inspected_entity ASC;
SELECT audit_id, audit_type, audit_result FROM regulatory_audits WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_audits WHERE audit_type = 'Compliance';
SELECT audit_id, audit_date FROM regulatory_audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT INSPECTION_DATE, inspection_result FROM regulatory_inspections WHERE inspected_entity = 'XYZ Corporation';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_audits JOIN regulatory_inspections ON regulatory_audits.audit_id = regulatory_inspections.inspection_id;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_audits WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_audits;
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, auditor_name FROM regulatory_audits WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT audit_type, auditor_name, audit_date FROM regulatory_audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inspections WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_result FROM inspections WHERE inspection_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, audit_type, auditor_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_audits;
SELECT inspector_name, inspection_result, inspection_date, compliance_status, inspection_id FROM inspections;
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description, regulation_id FROM telecommunications_regulations;
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, audit_type, auditor_name FROM regulatory_audits WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT inspection_id, inspection_date, inspector_name FROM inspections WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM Audit;
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, compliance_rating FROM Audit WHERE compliance_rating > 3;
SELECT body_name, jurisdiction FROM RegulatoryBody WHERE jurisdiction='USA';
SELECT * FROM Inspection ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT audited_entity, audit_date FROM Audit ORDER BY audit_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Audit ORDER BY audit_date DESC, audit_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT audited_entity, compliance_rating FROM Audit WHERE compliance_rating > 3 ORDER BY compliance_rating DESC;
SELECT body_name, jurisdiction FROM RegulatoryBody WHERE jurisdiction = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM Inspection WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY inspection_date ASC;
SELECT audit_id, MAX(audit_date) AS latest_audit_date FROM AuditHistory GROUP BY audit_id;
SELECT * FROM audits;
SELECT audit_id, audit_date, audit_type, audit_status FROM audits WHERE audit_status = 'Pending';
SELECT audit_id, audit_date FROM audits WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM regulations WHERE regulation_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
SELECT * FROM audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT audit_id, audit_type FROM audits WHERE audit_status='Pending';
SELECT inspection_date, inspector_name FROM inspections WHERE inspection_result='Failed' ORDER BY inspection_date ASC;
SELECT regulation_name FROM regulations WHERE LENGTH(regulation_description) > 50;
SELECT violation_id, violation_type, violation_description FROM violations WHERE violation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND violation_date <= '2022-12-31';
